name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PDF Tracking for Gmail Attachment by FeatPaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PDF open tracking and page view analytics for Gmail attachments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PDF open tracking and page view analytics for email attachments. Track if recipients opened attached PDFs and which page they were most interested in.

Boost your sales process by discovering invested prospects, finding what they are interested in, and knowing when to follow-up. Leverage real-time insights to tailor your approach and prioritize engaged leads.


Who to follow-up
- Track which recipients opened the attached PDF
- Capture more leads with the built-in lead forms.

When to follow-up
- Get notified when the PDF is opened: Real-time email notifications in your inbox

How to follow-up
- Analyze how viewers engaged: by page/viewer/device/time
- Discover deeper engagements: clicked links, revisited pages, downloads history

Add anything in PDF
- Embed dynamic contents including video, GIF, URLs, or tools
- Playable directly within documents

Customize PDF viewer
- Build your own viewre with brand assets
- Integrate communication channels/tools


Experience the power of PDF analytics and revolutionize your email communications with PDF Tracker. Take control of your sales process and unlock unparalleled insights today. Enjoy peace of mind knowing your efforts are backed by actionable data.
